text: <s> HTML is the backbone of web pages, providing structure and content. CSS styles HTML elements, enhancing design and layout. JavaScript adds interactivity and dynamic functionality to web pages, allowing for user engagement and manipulation of content in browsers. [INST] <<SYS>> I know HTML, CSS and JavaScript. What can be ideal career? [/INST] Careers include web developer, front-end developer, UI/UX designer, full-stack developer, software engineer, and digital marketer specializing in web technologies. These roles involve creating websites, web applications, designing user interfaces, and optimizing user experiences. </s>

<s> BTech is a degree that people achieve after completion of 4 years of engineering in fields such as Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, etc [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Software Engineering, Frontend developer, Backend developer, Full-Stack developer, Android developer, Cybersecurity analyst, Data analyst </s>

<s> MBA is a postgraduate degree in business administration. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is MBA. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Business Development Manager, Marketing Manager, Financial Analyst, Management Consultant, Operations Manager </s>

<s> A PhD is the highest academic degree awarded by universities for original research in various fields. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is PhD. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Research Scientist, Professor, Data Scientist, Senior Researcher, Policy Analyst </s>

<s> A Bachelor's degree is an undergraduate academic degree awarded by colleges and universities upon completion of a course of study typically lasting three to four years. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is Bachelor's Degree. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Sales Executive, Customer Service Representative, Administrative Assistant, Marketing Coordinator, Project Coordinator </s>

<s> A Master's degree is a postgraduate academic degree awarded by universities upon completion of a course of study typically lasting one to two years. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is Master's Degree. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Project Manager, Account Manager, Human Resources Manager, Financial Analyst, Marketing Manager </s>

<s> A diploma is a certificate or deed issued by an educational institution, such as a college or university, that testifies that the recipient has successfully completed a particular course of study. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is Diploma. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Technical Support Specialist, Engineering Technician, Medical Assistant, Paralegal, Dental Hygienist </s>

<s> A high school diploma is a certificate awarded to students who have successfully completed their high school education. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is High School Diploma. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Retail Sales Associate, Receptionist, Cashier, Security Guard, Food Service Worker </s>

<s> CFA is a professional credential offered by the CFA Institute to investment and financial professionals. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is CFA (Chartered Financial Analyst). Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Investment Analyst, Portfolio Manager, Financial Advisor, Risk Manager, Equity Analyst </s>

<s> A nursing degree is an academic qualification awarded to students who have completed a nursing program, preparing them for a career in nursing. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is Nursing Degree. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Registered Nurse, Nurse Practitioner, Nurse Educator, Nurse Manager, Clinical Nurse Specialist </s>

<s> LLB is a professional degree in law, preparing graduates for a career in the legal profession. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is Law Degree (LLB). Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are Lawyer, Legal Counsel, Legal Advisor, Legal Consultant, Corporate Counsel </s>

<s> A computer science diploma is an academic qualification awarded to students who have completed a program in computer science, preparing them for a career in IT. [INST] <<SYS>> My highest educational qualification is Computer Science Diploma. Which jobs should I look for? [/INST] Recommended jobs are IT Support Specialist, Web Developer, Software Tester, Network Administrator, Systems Analyst </s>

<s> A programming language is a set of instructions that allows a programmer to communicate with a computer and create software and applications. [INST] <<SYS>> Software Engineering [/INST] Which language in programming are you proficient in? </s>

<s> Java is a popular programming language known for its portability, meaning that programs written in Java can run on any device that has a Java Virtual Machine (JVM). It is used for building web applications, mobile applications (Android), and large-scale enterprise applications. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in Java [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in Java, you may consider looking for roles such as Software Engineer, Java Developer, Backend Developer, or Systems Analyst. </s>

<s> Python is a versatile and easy-to-read programming language used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, and more. It emphasizes readability and simplicity, making it an excellent choice for beginners and professionals alike. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in Python [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in Python, you may consider looking for roles such as Data Scientist, Python Developer, Machine Learning Engineer, or Software Engineer. </s>

<s> JavaScript is a programming language that enables interactive web pages. It is commonly used for frontend web development to create dynamic and interactive user interfaces, as well as for backend development with Node.js. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in JavaScript [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in JavaScript, you may consider looking for roles such as Frontend Developer, Full-Stack Developer, Web Developer, or Software Engineer. </s>

<s> C++ is a powerful programming language used for system programming, game development, and other performance-critical applications. It is known for its efficiency and is often used in industries like finance, telecommunications, and gaming. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in C++ [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in C++, you may consider looking for roles such as Software Engineer, Game Developer, Systems Programmer, or Embedded Systems Developer. </s>

<s> C# (pronounced as C sharp) is a programming language developed by Microsoft for building Windows applications, web applications, and games using the Unity game engine. It is similar to Java and is part of the .NET framework. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in C# [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in C#, you may consider looking for roles such as Software Engineer, Game Developer, Unity Developer, or Backend Developer. </s>

<s> Ruby is a dynamic, object-oriented programming language known for its simplicity and productivity. It is often used in web development with the Ruby on Rails framework, which emphasizes convention over configuration and rapid development. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in Ruby [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in Ruby, you may consider looking for roles such as Ruby on Rails Developer, Full-Stack Developer, Web Developer, or Software Engineer. </s>

<s> PHP is a server-side scripting language used for web development to create dynamic web pages and web applications. It is commonly used in conjunction with databases like MySQL and is often found in content management systems like WordPress. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in PHP [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in PHP, you may consider looking for roles such as PHP Developer, Web Developer, Backend Developer, or Software Engineer. </s>

<s> Swift is a programming language developed by Apple for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS app development. It is designed to be fast, secure, and easy to learn, making it ideal for developing apps for Apple devices. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in Swift [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in Swift, you may consider looking for roles such as iOS Developer, Mobile App Developer, Software Engineer, or Application Developer. </s>

<s>  Kotlin is a modern programming language used for Android app development as an alternative to Java. It is interoperable with Java, meaning that Kotlin code can be used alongside existing Java code in Android projects. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in Kotlin [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in Kotlin, you may consider looking for roles such as Android Developer, Mobile App Developer, Software Engineer, or Application Developer. </s>

<s> R is a programming language and software environment used for statistical computing and graphics, popular among data scientists and statisticians. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in R [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in R, you may consider looking for roles such as Data Scientist, R Developer, Statistical Analyst, or Research Scientist. </s>

<s> Go, also known as Golang, is a programming language developed by Google known for its efficiency and scalability. It is often used in cloud and distributed systems, as well as for web development and systems programming. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm proficient in Go [/INST] Great! With your proficiency in Go, you may consider looking for roles such as Software Engineer, Systems Engineer, Backend Developer, or Cloud Engineer. </s>

<s> Job experience refers to the duration and nature of employment that an individual has in a particular field or occupation. It includes the skills, knowledge, and expertise acquired through work in various roles and organizations. Job experience is often used as a measure of an individual's qualifications for a specific job or role, as it demonstrates their ability to perform tasks, handle responsibilities, and contribute effectively in a professional setting. [INST] <<SYS>> I have 4 years of job experience [/INST] Great! With this experience, you can get hired as a senior developer or may land with a managerial role at a tech company. </s>

<s> Job experience refers to the duration and nature of employment that an individual has in a particular field or occupation. It includes the skills, knowledge, and expertise acquired through work in various roles and organizations. Job experience is often used as a measure of an individual's qualifications for a specific job or role, as it demonstrates their ability to perform tasks, handle responsibilities, and contribute effectively in a professional setting. [INST] <<SYS>> I have 1+ years of job experience [/INST] Great! With this experience, you can join as an intern or a junior developer at any company as per your specialisation. </s>
<s> Software Engineer is responsible for designing, developing, and testing software applications. [INST] <<SYS>> What is your current job title? [/INST] Software Engineer </s>

<s> Finance industry involves managing financial transactions, analyzing market trends, and advising clients on financial matters. [INST] <<SYS>> My current job is in the Finance industry, so I would prefer jobs related to it. [/INST] Great! With your background in the Finance industry, you may consider looking for roles such as Financial Analyst, Investment Banker, Risk Manager, Financial Advisor, or Accounting Manager. </s>

<s> Engineering involves designing, building, and maintaining structures, machines, systems, and processes. [INST] <<SYS>> My current job is in the Engineering field, so I would prefer jobs related to it. [/INST] Great! With your background in the Engineering field, you may consider looking for roles such as Mechanical Engineer, Civil Engineer, Electrical Engineer, Software Engineer, or Project Manager. </s>

<s> Healthcare involves the maintenance or improvement of health through the prevention, diagnosis, treatment, recovery, or cure of disease, illness, injury, and other physical and mental impairments. [INST] <<SYS>> My current job is in the Healthcare industry, so I would prefer jobs related to it. [/INST] Great! With your background in the Healthcare industry, you may consider looking for roles such as Nurse, Physician, Pharmacist, Medical Technologist, or Healthcare Administrator. </s>

<s> Education involves the process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits. [INST] <<SYS>> My current job is in the Education field, so I would prefer jobs related to it. [/INST] Great! With your background in the Education field, you may consider looking for roles such as Teacher, Professor, Education Administrator, Curriculum Developer, or Academic Advisor. </s>

<s> Marketing involves promoting, selling, and distributing products or services to customers. [INST] <<SYS>> My current job is in the Marketing field, so I would prefer jobs related to it. [/INST] Great! With your background in the Marketing field, you may consider looking for roles such as Marketing Manager, Brand Manager, Digital Marketing Specialist, Market Research Analyst, or Advertising Account Executive. </s>

<s> Human Resources involves managing people within an organization, including hiring, training, and employee relations. [INST] <<SYS>> My current job is in the Human Resources field, so I would prefer jobs related to it. [/INST] Great! With your background in the Human Resources field, you may consider looking for roles such as HR Manager, Recruitment Specialist, Training Coordinator, Employee Relations Manager, or Compensation Analyst. </s>

<s> Frontend development involves creating the user interface and experience of a website or application using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Frontend development as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for CSS/HTML Developer, Front-End Web Designer, Web/Front-End User Interface (aka UI) Developer/Engineer, Mobile/Tablet Front-End Developer, Front-End SEO Expert, Front-End Accessibility Expert, Front-End Dev. Ops, Front-End Testing/QA. </s>

<s> Backend development involves building and maintaining the server-side logic, databases, and integrations of a website or application using languages like Python, Java, or Node.js. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Backend development as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Backend Developer, Server Engineer, Database Administrator, Systems Architect, Back-End Dev. Ops, Back-End Testing/QA. </s>

<s> Full-stack development involves working on both the frontend and backend of a website or application, often using frameworks like React or Angular for the frontend and Node.js or Django for the backend. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Full-Stack development as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Full-Stack Developer, Full-Stack Web Developer, Full-Stack Engineer, Full-Stack Architect, Full-Stack Consultant, Full-Stack Trainer, Full-Stack Evangelist. </s>

<s> Mobile app development involves creating applications for mobile devices like smartphones and tablets, using platforms like iOS (Swift) or Android (Java/Kotlin). [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Mobile App development as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Mobile Developer, Mobile App Developer, iOS Developer, Android Developer, Mobile Application UI Designer, Mobile UX Designer, Mobile Application Analyst, Mobile Application Sales & Marketing Manager. </s>

<s> DevOps involves practices and tools that aim to automate the processes between software development and IT teams, allowing for faster and more reliable software delivery. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in DevOps as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for DevOps Engineer, DevOps Manager, DevOps Consultant, DevOps Architect, DevOps Evangelist, DevOps Automation Engineer, DevOps Security Engineer, DevOps Tool Developer. </s>

<s> Data science involves analyzing and interpreting complex data to inform decision-making, often using programming languages like Python or R and tools like TensorFlow or PyTorch for machine learning. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Data Science as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Data Scientist, Data Engineer, Data Analyst, Machine Learning Engineer, Big Data Engineer, Business Intelligence (BI) Developer, Statistician. </s>

<s> Cybersecurity involves protecting computer systems, networks, and data from cyber attacks, often using programming languages like Python or C++ to develop security solutions. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Cybersecurity as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Cybersecurity Specialist, Information Security Analyst, Security Consultant, Ethical Hacker, Penetration Tester, Security Architect, Incident Responder, Cryptographer. </s>

<s> Cloud computing involves delivering computing services over the internet, often using platforms like Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Microsoft Azure, and programming languages like Java or Python for cloud development. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Cloud Computing as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Cloud Engineer, Cloud Architect, Cloud Consultant, Cloud Security Specialist, Cloud Network Engineer, Cloud DevOps Engineer, Cloud Storage Engineer, Cloud Support Engineer. </s>

<s> Embedded systems involve designing and developing computer systems that are embedded into other devices, often using programming languages like C or C++ for low-level system programming. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in Embedded Systems as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for Embedded Systems Engineer, Embedded Systems Software Developer, Embedded Systems Firmware Engineer, Embedded Systems Hardware Engineer, Embedded Systems Architect, Embedded Systems Test Engineer. </s>

<s> UI/UX design involves creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces and experiences for software applications, often using tools like Adobe XD or Sketch. [INST] <<SYS>> I'm looking for a job in UI/UX Design as I specialize in it. [/INST] Certainly, you can go for UI/UX Designer, Visual Designer, Interaction Designer, User Interface Designer, User Experience Designer, Product Designer, Usability Analyst, UI Developer. </s>
